name: Gala Clutch - Camel
description:
Simple yet sophisticated, the Gala Clutch adds a touch of glamour to your evening.  Featuring the original 442 McAdam vintage brass logo, you can find the Gala Clutch in a selection of colors.  Don't see the color you want?  Just make a color request and we will try our best to match your preference.  Chic teal satin lining is a sharp finishing touch to the Gala Clutch - a roomy interior for all your evening essentials.  

Genuine Leather (cowhide)
Made in Canada
approx. 11" x 6"

name: Mini Brief Bag - Purple
description:
Made-to-order: Will ship 2 weeks after purchase

This elegant miniature briefcase is built to fit your iPad as well as your daytime and night time accessories.  Fully lined with vinyl, the inside of the Mini Brief has a separated compartment for your iPad to keep it safe from your wallet, keys and makeup.  This bag is also lined with compartments for your phone, pens, etc to keep your daytime essentials organized.  The Mini Brief comes with a removable shoulder strap, and a briefcase handle for a more mature look.
Vintage-inspired, the Mini Brief features the original 442 ornate logo and brass hardware.
12"x9"x1"
Genuine Italian Cowhide Leather, Deep Purple
One of a kind, handmade by 442 McAdam designer Sarah Shell

name: Hobette - Heart Collection
description:
This is a perfect day-to-night chameleon.  It can hold your flip-flips to get you through those long nights, or attach the long spaghetti strap and wear it cross-body during the day.  Genuine Leather
Red Patent Snake print on cowhide leather.
Black Cowhide
Zippered Closure
Shoulder chain strap
Spaghetti Strap
11"x8.5"

name: Chappy - Heart Collection
description:
This beautiful little lady is perfectly ornate to enhance a casual attire, or remove the strap and wear it on your shoulder for an elegant evening bag.  Hand-detailed pleats, Chain handle, removable spaghetti strap, magnetic flap. Genuine Leather

Red Patent Snake embossed on cowhide
Red and black top grain cowhide
gold chain
10.5"x7"

name: Hobo - Heart Collection
description:
Durable and practical, comfortably sits across the chest and rests at the hips, you'll forget you're wearing a bag!  Removable leather sling, tote straps, zippered closure, inner compartments.  Genuine Leather
Red Patent Snake embossed on cowhide leather
Black top grain cowhide leather
Gold hardware
17"x11"

name: Pencil Skirt - Heart
description:
A great alternative to a briefcase. Features removable leather sling, tote straps, zippered closure, inner compartments. A classic 442 McAdam silhouette. Genuine Leather.
Top Grain Italian Leather - Wine patent snake embossed on cowhide.
Gold hardware 
15"x15.5"

name: Marsha - Heart Collection
description:
A wonderful day bag, convertible to an evening purse.  Features removable leather sling, structured exterior, zippered pocket, gold chain handle, magnetic flap.  Genuine Leather
Red Patent Snake embossed on cowhide leather
Black top grain cowhide leather
Gold hardware
12"x9"x2.5"

**NEXT SHIPMENT: June 30th

name: Tennis Skirt Bag
description:
The Tennis Skirt Bag fuses a 442 original silhouette with saddlery-inspired lines.  This is a great alternative to a briefcase, fits a laptop.
Adjustable leather sling, zippered closure, inner compartments, magnetic flap. 
Extremely durable and practical
100% cowhide leather 
Made in Canada
15"x15,5"

name: Skort Bag - Brown
description:
The Skort is part of our Skirt Bag collection.
Carries business needs, including a laptop when unfolded
Fold-down option
Made of Top-Grain Italian leather, Made in Canada

Dimensions: 13.5" Width at top, 16" Width at bottom, 17.5" tall when open, 11.5" tall when folded
Hardware: Gold-Plated steel
Straps: Removable long sling, and chain with lamb-skin shoulder strap for folded option
Closure: Zipper
Inner: 3 pockets, removable keychain clasp, logo plate.  Bengaline lining with extra durability coating

name: Hannah - Brown
description:
The Hannah bag is part of our Marsha collection - a mid-sized day bag with removable cross-body strap and elegant chain handle for day-to-night use.  
Made of Top-Grain Italian leather, including Gator texture.  Made in Canada

Dimensions: 10" Wide at top, 11.5" Wide at bottom, 9" Tall, 2.5" Deep
Hardware: Gold-Plated Steel
Straps: Removable sling and chain strap
Closure: Magnetic
Inner: Zippered pocket, removable keychain clasp, logo plate.  Bengaline lining with extra durability coating

name: Jewel Bag - Brown
description:
The Jewel is part of our evening collection.  This small-size purse has a double-chain strap, which means you can wear it as a long single-strap across your body, or double the strap and wear it elegantly over your shoulder.
Made of Top-Grain Italian leather and Gator-texture top-grain Italian leather.  Made in Canada

Dimensions: 7.5" Wide at top, 10" wide at bottom, 7.5" Tall
Hardware: Nickel-Plated Steel
Straps: Chain, doubled through grommets, or longer single strap.
Closure: Magnetic
Inner: Pockets, logo plate.  Bengaline lining with extra durability coating

name: Regal Trio - Wine and Black
description:
This is a versatile evening purse.  It contains all the function of a wallet (omplete with zippered change pocket, slots for cards, space for a cell phone, and divided area for bills) but is a classic evening staple. Included is a gold chain, to carry on your shoulder or as a wristlet, and there is also a long leather spaghetti strap for cross-body wear.  
Also available in all Black

100% Top Grain Italian Leather

Gold hardware

name: Mister - Black
description:
Durable and professional, the Mr. Bag holds your laptop, PDAs and files with room to spare.  Features removable leather strap, leather handles, zippered closure, inner compartments.  An exterior flap secures two additional roomy pockets, as well as a back large pocket for quick access to files.  
Genuine Top-Grain Leather
Silver Hardware
Made in Canada
16.5"x12"x2.5"
